Description: Funerary papyrus of Padiweriabtet containing First Book of Breathing (long version) written in hieratic script on the recto. Demotic text on the verso contains the Book of Breathing, which proceeds (Sm) under his head.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: Herbin, F.-R., Books of Breathing and Related Texts (Catalogue of the Books of the Dead and Other Related Texts in the British Museum IV), London, 2008, pp. 50-76, pls. 29-32.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (181)
Herbin 2008 / Books of Breathing and Related Texts (pp.50-76, pls. 29-32)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57785) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57785)
Vleeming 2015 / Demotic graffiti and other short texts gathered from many publications (no.1994, p.347)
